subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Draymond Green had 16 points, 13 rebounds and 6 assists as the top-seeded Spartans moved on to the Round of 16, where they will play Louisville.
snippet: Draymond Green had 16 points, 13 rebounds and 6 assists as the top-seeded Spartans moved on to the Round of 16, where they will play Louisville.
